pros: Has a bind skill Shadow Stitch
Has a passive revive Darkness Ascending
Can avoid some %Max HP attacks Dark Sight
Cygnus Knight characters do not need Mastery Books
cons: Few mobbing skills only Shadow Spark and Dark Omen pre-5th Job
Most skills are single-target attacks like Quintuple Star

baseStats: Excludes attack specfic bonuses, Hyper Skill passives, Link Skills, and buffs with cooldowns

details: Can be stacked up to 5 times, once for each unique Cygnus Knight to reach Master Level

info: To create one, choose the 'Cygnus Knights' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until you reach Lv. 10 and Ereve. You will see 5 NPCs on the left after talking to Neinheart. Talk to Eckhart to become a Night Walker

build: -> -> -> ->

-> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
details: Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path
To obtain Call of Cygnus, you need to complete a series of quests in 4th Job

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Quintuple Star - Reinforce and Boss Rush
  • Dark Omen - Cooldown Cutter and Spread
  • Vitality Siphon - Reinforce

extraContent.title: Dark Sight + Dark Attribute & Throwing Star Attacks
extraContent.content:
Referenced from Nox and Fatalyz

Dark Sight can only ignore falling debris such as from bosses like Magnus meteors, Pierre hats, Vellum rocks, Papulatus falling clocks, and Lotus demolishers. There are several %Max HP attacks that can be ignored, for example, Magnus spin attack, Crimson Queen's DoT flame, and Damien falling yellow/red meteors

Other attacks that can be avoided include, Gollux reverse key bomb (debuff still applies but no damage or stun is taken) and Magnus stun smoke Most non-debris one-shots cannot be avoided. For example, Vellum's tail attack and head pop, Von Bon's orb projectile and Crimson Queen's flame breath

All direct endgame boss attacks such as Lotus, Damien, Lucid and Will are unavoidable

Dark Attribute

In 4th Job, the cooldown of Dark Omen is reduced whenever a Dark-attribute attack hits an enemy. In 5th Job, for Shadow Spear, dark energy gathers until a spear appears as you use Dark-attribute attacks. Below is a list of all your Dark-attribute attacks:

  • Shadow Bats (1st Job) - Will not reduce cooldown
  • Shadow Spark (3rd Job)
  • Quintuple Star (4th Job)
  • Dark Omen (4th Job) - Will not reduce cooldown
  • Dominion (Hyper Skill)
  • Shadow Spear (5th Job)
  • Shadow Bite (5th Job)
  • Rapid Throw (5th Job)

Throwing Star Attacks

In 1st Job, you gain the buff, Dark Elemental which causes your Throwing Star attacks to debuff enemies. Additionally, Throwing Star attacks gain increased %Final Damage while in the air from Shadow Jump. Below is a list of all your Throwing Star attacks:

  • Lucky Seven (1st Job)
  • Triple Throw (2nd Job)
  • Quad Star (3rd Job)
  • Shadow Spark (3rd Job)
  • Quintuple Star (4th Job)
  • Rapid Throw (5th Job)

primary.name: Elemental Slash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 0, Damage: 130%, Number of Attacks: 1, Max Enemies Hit: 3
primary.desc: Strikes forward hitting multiple enemies

primary.name: Imperial Recall
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, return to Ereve immediately.\nCooldown: 600 sec.

primary.name: Elemental Harmony
primary.shortDesc: Luck increases 1 for every 2 levels the character gains

primary.name: Elemental Expert
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power and Magic ATT: +10%

primary.name: Elemental Shift
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 4, jumps further in the appropriate direction
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be activated by pressing jump twice
While in the air, pressing the Up Arrow and Jump Key will perform a vertical jump

primary.name: Lucky Seven
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 16, Damage: 190%, Number of Attacks: 2
primary.desc: Throws 2 throwing stars at a single enemy

primary.name: Dark Elemental
primary.shortDesc: Hit enemies with Throwing Stars Skill for a 20% chance to create a Mark of Darkness that stacks 2 times. Marked enemies will take 80% damage over time per stack every second for 5 seconds, and if Night Walkers attack these enemies, they'll ignore 4% defense per stacked Mark of Darkness.\n[Passive Effects: Final Damage +15%]
primary.desc: While toggled, your Throwing Star attacks have a chance to debuff enemies (up to 2 stacks)
details: [Debuff]: Marked enemies take periodic damage and your attacks deal increased %Ignore DEF
[Passive]: Permanently increases %Final Damage

primary.name: Haste
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Duration: 180 sec, Speed: +40, Jump: +20\n[Passive Effects - Max Speed: +20, Avoidability: +15%]

primary.name: Dark Sight
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, hides in the shadows for 200 seconds.\nIf dodged attacks that deal damage in proportion to Max HP, when Dark Sight is deactivated, cooldown increased per attack dodged: 3 seconds. Stacks up to 5 times.
primary.desc: While active, you cannot hit or be hit by enemies
details: Has a cooldown (3 secs, stacks up to 5 times) per attack dodged
You can use Shadow Jump while in Dark Sight

primary.name: Shadow Dodge
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, pushes you back a short distance.\nCooldown: 5 sec
primary.desc: Dash backward
details: Can be used while using Throwing Star skills

primary.name: Shadow Jump
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5, jumps further\n[Passive Effect - Final Damage of Throwing Star Skill in Air: +15%]
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Final Damage of Throwing Star skills while in the air

Can be assigned a Key Slot using or activated by pressing jump twice
  • While in the air, if you combine this with the Up Arrow Key, you will perform a vertical jump
Right-clicking the skill will toggle a function ON/OFF that allows you to jump in place unless you press the Left / Right Arrow Key while jumping
Can be used while using Throwing Star skills

primary.name: Shadow Bat
primary.shortDesc: Summons a Shadow Bat for 60 sec for every 3 times that you hit with a Throwing Star skill. Max number of bats: 2. When using a Throwing Star skill, there is a 50% chance that the character flies towards the target and inflicts 150% damage. Also bounces off 3 enemies and inflicts the same amount of damage before disappearing. Recovers 1% of Max HP on first damage. Damage Against Normal Monsters: +35%.
primary.desc: While toggled, periodically when you hit an enemy with a Throwing Star skill, a Shadow Bat is summoned. When a Shadow Bat is active, Throwing Star skills have a chance to trigger the Shadow Bat to seek and attack an enemy
details: Can bounce off to multiple enemies
Initial hit will restore some %Max HP
Deals increased %Damage to regular monsters

primary.name: Triple Throw
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 25, Number of Attacks: 2, Damage: 240%. Number of Explosion: 1, Explosion Damage: 350%
primary.desc: Throws 3 throwing stars at a single enemy
details: The last star will deal increased damage

primary.name: Throwing Booster
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 21, Claw Attack Speed increased for 180 sec
primary.desc: Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)

primary.name: Throwing Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Damage: +30%, Claw Mastery: +50%, Throwing Stars: +200
details: Additionally increases the max number of charges each Throwing Star slot can hold

primary.name: Critical Throw
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +35%, Critical Damage: +10%

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases LUK by 60

primary.name: Adaptive Darkness
primary.shortDesc: Chance to place Mark of Darkness: 5%, Maximum Stacking Limit: 1, DoT Per Stack: 40%, Defense Rate Ignored Per Mark: +1%.
details: Increases chance to apply debuff
Increases max stacks of debuff up to 3
Increases %Ignore DEF provided per stack and now deals damage over time

primary.name: Bat Affinity
primary.shortDesc: Shadow Bat's Attack Chance: 20%, Max Summon Limit: 1, Damage: 120%, Max Enemies Hit: 1
details: Increases activation chance and %Damage
Increases the maximum number of Shadow Bats up to 3

primary.name: Quad Star
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 41, Number of Attacks: 3, Damage: 300%. Number of Explosions: 1, Damage: 400%.
primary.desc: Throws 4 throwing stars at a single enemy
details: The last star will deal increased damage

primary.name: Shadow Spark
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 35, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 590%, Enemies Hit From Explosion: 6, Damage From Explosion: 690%
primary.desc: Throws a Throwing Star that pierces through enemies before exploding

primary.name: Dark Servant
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 65, Summon Duration: 180 sec. Your shadow attacks, dealing 70% of the Final Damage of your throwing star skills.
primary.desc: Creates a clone that follows your movements and copies your attacks after a short delay
details: Attacks are limited to Throwing Star skills and Movement skills
Clone's attacks deal reduced %Final Damage

primary.name: Spirit Projection
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20 and 100 throwing stars, Duration: 180 sec
primary.desc: Allows your attacks to not consume Throwing Stars

primary.name: Enveloping Darkness
primary.shortDesc: Abnormal Status Resistance: +15, Elemental Resistance: +15%

primary.name: Alchemic Adrenaline
primary.shortDesc: Recovery Amount: +170%, Critical Damage: +10%
details: Recovery is not increased for percentage-based items like Elixirs

primary.name: Adaptive Darkness II
primary.shortDesc: Chance to place Mark of Darkness: 5%, Maximum Stacking Limit: 1, DoT Per Stack: 50%, Defense Rate Ignored Per Mark: +1%.
details: Increases chance to apply debuff
Increases max stacks of debuff up to 4
Increases %Ignore DEF provided per stack

primary.name: Bat Affinity II
primary.shortDesc: Shadow Bat's Max Summon Limit: 1, Damage: 150%, Max Enemies Hit: 1
details: Increases activation chance and %Damage
Increases the maximum number of Shadow Bats up to 4

primary.name: Darkness Ascending
primary.shortDesc: When hit by an attack that would prove fatal, recover 50% of Max HP per 3 sec. If Shadow Bats are currently summoned, they are consumed to recover 10% extra HP per bat. Invincible for 2 sec while recovering, and again at the end of skill.\nCooldown: 1800 sec
primary.desc: When hit by a fatal attack, you will not die but instead continuously heal back a percentage of your HP
details: Depending on how many were active, you gain increased healing
Briefly invincible during recovery and at the end of the skill
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Call of Cygnus
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Increases all stats assigned APs by 15% for 900 sec
details: To obtain Call of Cygnus, you need to complete the quest 'The Alliance Gathers' at Lv. 120

primary.name: Cygnus Knights' Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 360 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds

primary.name: Quintuple Star
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 36, Number of Attacks: 4, Damage: 340%. Number of Explosions: 1, Explosion Damage: 475%
primary.desc: Throws 5 throwing stars at a single enemy
details: The last star will deal increased damage

primary.name: Dark Omen
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 110, Duration: 5, Max Enemies Hit every 0.3 sec: 6, Damage: 500%. Summon 1 Shadow Bat per 3 enemies hit. Max number of bats: 2.\nCooldown: 20 sec. Cooldown decreased by 0.5 sec per dark-attribute attack success, except Shadow Bat and Dark Omen.
primary.desc: Summons a stationary pack of bats that damages enemies within it
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect and you cannot be pushed back when casting this skill
Cooldown is reduced when an enemy is hit by a Dark-attribute attack except for and

primary.name: Shadow Stitch
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 66, Extends your shadow up to 5 sec while you hold the key. Releasing will activate the skill. Max Enemies Hit Within Shadow: 15, Damage: 850%. Bind Duration: incapacitated for 10 sec Incapacitation increases by 1 sec for 1 enemies hit. Increases up to 13 sec\nBind Duration: Up to +100%, depending on damage inflicted with Shadow Stitch.\nCooldown: 210 sec
primary.desc: While held, extend a creeping shadow that binds enemies that are affected when released
details: Gain 100% Knockback Resistance while holding the skill

primary.name: Throwing Expert
primary.shortDesc: Claw Mastery: +70%. Attack Power: +30, Critical Damage: +10%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now grants flat Attack and increases %Crit Damage

primary.name: Dark Blessing
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: 30, Monster DEF Ignored: +15%

primary.name: Adaptive Darkness III
primary.shortDesc: Chance to place Mark of Darkness: 5%, Maximum Stacking Limit: 1, DoT Per Stack: 50%, Defense Rate Ignored Per Mark: +1%.
details: Increases chance to apply debuff
Increases max stacks of debuff up to 5
Increases %Ignore DEF provided per stack and %Damage dealt over time

primary.name: Bat Affinity III
primary.shortDesc: Shadow Bat's Attack Chance: 30%, Max Summon Limit: 1, Damage: 200%, Max Enemies Hit: 1
details: Increases activation chance and %Damage
Increases the maximum number of Shadow Bats up to 5

primary.name: Vitality Siphon
primary.shortDesc: Absorbs liveliness from your enemies when laying the Mark of Darkness with Dark Elemental. When liveliness absorbed reaches 30, it will all be consumed, maintained for 15 sec, and a Protective Shield that absorbs up to max 3250 damage will be created.\nAbsorbed liveliness will be maintained for 10 sec, and this time will reset when you set the Mark of Darkness.
primary.desc: When applying , you absorb stacks of 'Liveliness' from enemies to gain a shield
details: At 30 stacks of Liveliness, gain a shield that absorbs damage
Liveliness stacks disappear if you do not gain more stacks

primary.name: Shadow Slip
primary.shortDesc: Dodge Chance: +40%, Damage Taken: -10%
primary.desc: Grants a chance to dodge attacks

hyperActive.name: Shadow Illusion
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, Summons 3 Shadows, Duration: 30 sec. Each shadow makes an additional hit that is 70%, 50%, 30% of the final damage.\nCooldown: 180 sec
hyperActive.desc: Summons 3 clones at once and function like
details: Each clone deals a reduced amount of %Final Damage

hyperActive.name: Dominion
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 350, Damage: 1000%, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Number of Attacks: 10. Grants invincibility while this skill is active. Use Throwing Stars skill within 30 sec of skill to receive Mark of Darkness at max stacks, and summon Shadow Bats that receive the following effects- [Final Damage: +20%. All attacks will be critical hits, immune to knockback.]\nCooldown: 180 sec.
hyperActive.desc: Unleash a dark attack that leaves the map in a stasis
details: Using Throwing Star skills during this period will cause enemies to have max stacks of debuff
You also gain %Final Damage and immunity to knockbacks and all your attacks will be critical hits during the duration of this skill
Right-clicking the skill will toggle the gray background ON/OFF while the attack is active

hyperActive.name: Glory of the Guardians
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Applies to any Cygnus class or Mihile in the party

fifthMain.name: Shadow Spear
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Duration: 75. shadows form on the ground every time you use a dark attribute skill (except Shadow Spear and summons)
The shadows slowly gather into a spear dealing 200% damage 4 times on up to 8 enemies
If there are enough shadows, they'll form into a giant spear that deals 800% damage 6 times on up to 12 enemies
All the Shadow Spear's attacks increase Damage Against Normal Monsters by 25%
Cooldown: 168 sec.
fifthMain.desc: While active, dark energy gathers every time you use a Dark-attribute attack except for Shadow Spear and summons until a spear appears and strikes enemies from beneath
details: The spear will slowly grow in size until it becomes a giant spear that deals increased %Damage
Deals increased %Damage to regular monsters
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Greater Dark Servant
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 800, Summon Duration: 42 sec. Shadow attacks from a fixed location, dealing additional 50% of the Final Damage of your throwing star skills.\nActivate to swap places up to 3 times\nCooldown: 60 sec
fifthMain.desc: Summons a stationary clone that faces in the direction of the enemy with the highest Max HP
details: Will mimic your Throwing Star attacks
Can trigger and
You can press the Skill Key to swap places with the clone (up to 3 times)
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Shadow Bite
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1500, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 800%, Number of Attacks: 14, deals 1200% damage to boss monsters, creates a Shadow Bat where an enemy received an attack if a Shadow Bat can be summoned\nIf an enemy has been defeated by Shadow Bite, the Final Damage increases by 2% per 1 enemy for 20 sec. If you attacked a boss monster, the Final Damage increases by 16%. The Final Damage increased by Shadow Bite is applied up to 18%.\nCooldown: 15 sec
fifthMain.desc: Shadow Bats attack nearby enemies and creates at their location
details: Deals increased damage to bosses

If the enemy is defeated by the bite, gains increased %Final Damage
  • If the enemy hit was a boss, gains more %Final Damage

fifthMain.name: Rapid Throw
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, consecutively throw shadow throwing stars with 950% damage 5 times for 1.8 sec then finish with a huge shadow throwing star that attacks up to 10 enemies with 1700% damage 13 times\nTap repeatedly while the skill is in use to increase the consecutive throwing duration up to 3 sec\nCooldown: 90 sec
fifthMain.desc: Throws a barrage of stars forward before throwing a final giant throwing star
details: Continuously pressing the Skill Key will extend the duration of the attack
When used in the air, you will remain in the air until the attack ends
While attacking, if is active, it will not deactivate

meta: Night Walker is LUK thief class part of the Cygnus Knights. Night Walkers are known for their bossing capabilities. Additionally, they use Throwing Stars as ammo for their skills
